dc_title_s: A plan of the town & fortress of Gariah belonging to Angria the admiral to the Sahou Rajah on the coast of Mallabar
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 map | Abstract: Map of the fort at Vijayadurg (also known as Vijaydurg or Viziadrug, historically also known as Gariah or Gheriah) in present-day Sindhudurg district, Maharashtra state, on the southwestern coast of India. | Notes: Depths shown by soundings.|Detached from: The gentleman's magazine, and historical chronicle. Volume XXVI : for the year M.DCC.LVI. London : Printed for D. Henry, and R. Cave, 1756. Map followed page 618 in: Supplement to the gentleman's magazine : for the year 1756.|Includes descriptive index ("Explanation") to various features of the fort and surrounding area. | Scale approximately 1:110,000
dc_publisher_s: Printed for D. Henry, and R. Cave
